response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. This exceptional item is valued at $8,000 by both myself and you, ensuring a perfect match for your needs. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is an exclusive chance to secure a high-quality product at a discounted rate, making it a valuable investment for you. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier service. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 7200}
